extendedInfo.description: App2SD (Move app 2 SD)With this handy app, you'll have more control over your ever expanding collection of apps.this app solves all your memory issues.A great UI that makes it easy to:-â notify when a new movable app is installed.âadded setting menu.ânow notification can be disabled on setting menu.âshows system apps(pro only).âexport app list to sdcard in csv format.ânotify if cache size is more than 512 kb in setting(by default it is disabled).âshow internal and sdcard total and free storage.â View all SD card capable apps and move them.â show app cache/data/code/total size.â move apps from phone to SD Cardâ uninstall apps.â Filtered system apps.â sort through apps stored on phone and SD cardâ move apps back to phone.â view app on Marketâ open app.â share app with one click without backup.â three sort modes by install time,size and name ascending and descending.â move all apps option.â show app details page.â support "Move2SD Enabler"âMove to sd or movetosd all sdmove apps and also sdwatch card for memory shortages.This app is not used to backup apps to SD card. It only helps you to move a portion of apps used space to SD card.Galaxy S3 and Note2 is not supported:* Galaxy S3 and Note2 configures the SD card as a secondary external storage. This is configured by Samsung. Nothing developers can do about this. Please contact Samsung for details. No Notification Ads - we don't use any notification ads.Note:-there may be device apart from this two which doesn't support app2sd so please check if ur device support app2sdIf you are interested in helping us to translate this app to your native language, please let me know by email. Thanks.FAQ:-1. What is "App2SD"?"App2SD" is short for app to SD card, and it is also called app to sd.2. Why do so many apps that cannot moved to sdcard(App2SD)?ANS:-1.Only the app is configured to supported to be installed on SD card by the developer that can it App2SD. So you will see many apps are "On Phone Only".2.The app is copyright protected.3.APP2SD is a feature introduced from android version 2.2 ,so not all apps support this feature.4.The developer forces his app can only be installed to phone storage.This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: No \"move\" option ...
reviews.comment: Most apps show up as movable but do not show a \"move to SD\" option at all. I am, however, running CM10, not sure if that may be the reason.
reviews.author: Blas Morilla

reviews.title: Dont bother its been ruined
reviews.comment: All but one app that apps2sd said was able to move to sd card no longer work and when I try to move them back I get \"app not installed\" so i try to re downloaded the app and It still does not work!! And I cant uninstall because its apparently not installed!!!!! so my phone is now full of apps that don\'t work which I cant uninstall or reinstall so my only option is to wipe my phone which means I will lose all my saves ect!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Ian Robinson

reviews.title: Just bings up the App Settings
reviews.comment: Nothing that you couldn\'t do without this app.  In fact, it\'s easier without this app.  Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: Garrett Neuenkirchen

reviews.title: Where is the move to sd option
reviews.comment: Where is the move2sd option plz reply and show me a video thank you cuz im really stuck if this is fixed or shown I will change my rating and review
reviews.author: Tahmid Islam

reviews.comment: Thank you, BitDefender found this as aggressive software..It isn\'t so precise about apps but I don\'t want to risk to download one with bad comments. Any other app to help me move apps to SD?
reviews.author: Maria Zabbidou

reviews.title: Can destroy your SD card.
reviews.comment: This app delivers what it  say. My experience is: My 8 Gb SD card became 128 mb only, after using this app. 4gb data is lost. Even the SDcard is not usable/formatteble any more in win7/ubuntu/ICS. Low level formatting does not helped. Use this if are about to discard any working SDcard.
reviews.author: Bhaskar Mukherjee

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: It does its job on this Pantech Burst, but the second time it goes to loading, it doesn\'t, so therefore I have to deal with the inconvenience of exiting, killing, and reopening the app for every app I want to move. Luckily, the apps I need to move can be moved, so I give this 4 stars, very productive app, but it came with an inconvenience for me. ;)  UPDATE: Moved all but Dropbox, which is good. Apps function normally, very pleased with this app. Now, apps I have and WILL have go to the SDcard, not memory.
reviews.author: Collin Brown

reviews.title: App doesn\'t work! !
reviews.comment: Waste of time..apps don\'t move from internal memory to sd card like it says it does.
reviews.author: Danielle Laws

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great, no issues. Easily move apps between SD card and device
